price: “Usibye gusa umuryango wa Lutwi (Loti). Mu by’ukuri turabarokora bose.”
arabic: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: illā āla lūṭin innā lamunajjūhum ajmaʿīna
